inclusion.criterion: enrolled and randomized, prior to the first PAD
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: blinding: randomization is done by the investigator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: treatment: preoperative donation of multiple units (more than 2) 450 mL autologous whole blood and storage without leukocyte depletion
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient is a 25-year-old pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency, frequency, and severe flank pain. She has no history of recurrent UTI or underlying disease.
